mechanics.outcome: Character gains an Ability Score Improvement (ASI) opportunity

mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase a single ability score
mechanics.outcome: One chosen ability score increases by 2

mechanics.condition: Player chooses to increase two ability scores
mechanics.outcome: Two chosen ability scores each increase by 1

mechanics.trigger: Attempting to increase an ability score
mechanics.condition: Applying the Ability Score Improvement feature
mechanics.outcome: An ability score cannot be increased above 20

description_text: When you reach 4th level, and again at 8th, 12th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability scores of your choice by 1. As normal, you can't increase an ability score above 20 using this feature.
